extendedInfo.description: Clever Bill Splitter is the only bill splitter app youâll need!Take the hard work out of splitting bills and checks.  Simply take a picture of a receipt with your camera, assign the items among your friends any way you choose and you are done! Clever Splitter comes with 7 free receipts.  Unlock unlimited receipts for only $0.99 (in-app purchase)!Split it any way you want!Features:--We use OCR to read in your bill's items. No typing needed!--Use the placement of your party around the table to assign your items. You don't have to input any names! (but you can if thatâs your thing)--Split an item between any number of people. Clever Splitter accounts for fractions of items when, for example, you split an appetizer or a bottle of wine among everybody.--Tax rate is adjustable for those who travel.--Our tip calculator not only allows you set the tip rate, but also round up or down to make paying cash easier!(c) Clever Turtles

reviews.title: Very useful in restaurants
reviews.comment: Effortlessly split a $100 bill between 6 people. Awesome idea and an amazing implementation!
reviews.author: Boris Beltinov

reviews.title: OCR hasn\'t get my bill
reviews.comment: After 3 times i have giving up :(  Amazing idee herefor 3 stars.
reviews.author: Mark Stein

reviews.title: Need negative line item + better OCR
reviews.comment: Good app. Quick and simple enough. I\'d like to be able to add a negative line item and OCR isn\'t very accurate.
reviews.author: Roy M

reviews.title: Perfect app for the night out
reviews.comment: Went out last night with 12 people and waiter put everyone on one bill. People were fighting it hard to see how must they owed and we were latterly there for 30 minutes trying to figure out the amounts for each tab. Total amount was $168. This app is definitely worth the download
reviews.author: Kent Peterson

reviews.title: Don\'t work
reviews.comment: Good ideas but Don\'t seems to be able to capture the items on the bill correctly...sad
reviews.author: Shirley Lim

reviews.title: Randomly deleting pictures
reviews.comment: Was trying this today but whenever i take a picture it shows some of my other pictures taken before and deleting them.. uninstalling
reviews.author: Chun Yeen Mok

reviews.title: Needs option of tax that is applied on top of sales tax.
reviews.comment: I have a 7% gst tax that is on top of the subtotal + 10% service tax. E.g. if bill is 100, service tax is 10 and gst is 7% of 110 not 7% of 100. This app cant do this so the final amount is always a little off.
reviews.author: Gilbert Thomas

reviews.title: Nice idea, poor execution
reviews.comment: OCR does not work even close to effectively. Nice idea. Would love it if it worked even 50%.
reviews.author: Sven Woxholt

reviews.title: Can be improved
reviews.comment: In my country, tip is calculated before tax and this option is not available. Also, the camera receipt fails most of the time!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I\'ve been waiting for something like this for a long time
reviews.comment: This really works great. Better than any other app of the sort because it effectively uses the camera and OCR to insert all items to split- perfect for large groups with long bills. The UI is friendly and simple. Did not run into any problems so far.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: This app is going to make splitting the bill so easy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Tested this for the first time a couple days ago and it worked beautifully. My only request would be adding the option to put in names. I found myself getting a little confused which icon went with which person in my group of 7.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful and fast
reviews.comment: Compared to similar apps, this one shines in many ways: Ocr helps avoid lengthy typing Design is phast and easy All information is concise and clear
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing App
reviews.comment: The BEST of the best app. Amazing!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The best app I ever tried
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Well done app creators.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great implementation of existing idea.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Cute
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So cool!
reviews.comment: Works very well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect for folks who eat with friends and are on a budget :)
reviews.comment: This app is perfect for anyone who\'s eating out with friends, but especially those who don\'t drink much or order frugally and hate splitting the bill equally but also don\'t want to make a stink. This makes he vil splitting process into a fun little game. If only I could design my own avatar ;D
reviews.author: A Google User
